unittitle_ssm: Volume of school work by students at Holy Cross School
abstract_ssm: A bound volume of school work by several students at the Holy Cross School in the Flatbush neighborhood of Brooklyn.  The volume was created to commemorate the Columbian Exposition in Chicago in 1893.
subject_ssm: School children -- New York (State) -- Kings County
collection_ssm: Volume of school work by students at Holy Cross School
